definition: official website (abbr. for 官方網站|官方网站[guan1 fang1 wang3 zhan4])

sentences.english: “He's been fantastic this season,” Walcott told Arsenal.com.
sentences.chinese: “这个赛季他太棒了，”沃尔科特告诉官网。

sentences.english: This photo shows the contest's homepage.
sentences.chinese: 这张照片取自竞赛官网主页。

sentences.english: I use the World Cup website because of fun.
sentences.chinese: 我使用世足赛官网因为有趣。

sentences.english: I have been an assistant to the general manager.
sentences.chinese: 我做过总梦幻西游官网经理助理。

sentences.english: He transports his boat by putting it on a trailer behind his car.
sentences.chinese: 他将小艇放在通博娱乐官网网址后面的拖车上运输。

sentences.english: More backgrounds can be downloaded from the application’s website.
sentences.chinese: 还可以在软件的官网下载更多的背景图片。

sentences.english: I use the World Cup website because it is cool.
sentences.chinese: 我使用世足赛官网是因为它是酷的。

sentences.english: I use the World Cup website because it makes me feel I won't be alone.
sentences.chinese: 我使用世足赛官网是因为它让我感到不孤独。

sentences.english: That's their prediction based on an annual NBA. com survey to be released today.
sentences.chinese: 这是今天公布的NBA官网的年度预测调查。

sentences.english: NE radiation to find the official website white tea.
sentences.chinese: 就找到了NE防辐射美白茶的官网。

definition: government/official (approved or issued by an authority)
to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
to release/to issue/to announce/to distribute/also written 發布|发布[fa1 bu4]
